member.name: M:HackneyAddressesAPI.Controllers.PostcodeController.Get(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String)
member.summary: Search property details via post code.
member.param: The postcode parameter
Property class code to re-fine search results
Textual property class
Address Status for historical/approved addresses, default is Approved Preferred
For pagination, set the offset of results, index inclusive
For pagination, set the amount of results returned
To change the return format, from either GIS or Default
member.returns: Returns either GIS or Default Format
